```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)
library(viridis)
```

# Loading in Taxi Zone Codes
```{r}
taxi_zones = read.csv("./data/taxi_zones.csv")

taxi_zones %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point()
```

# Mapping
```{r}
pal = colorFactor(
  palette = magma,
  domain = taxi_zones$borough
)

taxi_zones %>% 
  leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron) %>% 
  addCircleMarkers(
    ~x, ~y,
    color = ~pal(borough),
    radius = 1
  )
```
